website_summaries.verdict: Choose this proofing basket if you want to make longer, oval-shaped loaves.
pros: Works for proofing, banneton, or brotform baking techniques
Large oval bowl with removable cloth liner and eBook on baking sourdough bread
Handmade with unbleached natural rattan cane
Cloth liner can be hand or machine washed
cons: Some find this basket too narrow to be practical
consider what kind of bread you wish to make

customer_reviews.title: Good 1.5 lb Proofing Basket
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd oval basket I've purchased. I like this one better since it is deeper than the other 10" basket. (The other one seems too small for my 1.5 lb. loaf.) The instruction booklet was also handy since it explained how to condition, use and wash the basket. Very happy..
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Love all three and the liner in them
customer_reviews.text: I've bought three proofing baskets now. One round for artesan style bread, then this one, and last one a little shorter. Love all three and the liner in them. Baskets are very smooth and after dusting the liner with flour, the dough does not stick. All three appear to be very good quality and I felt a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Schatz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size For Artisan Breads
customer_reviews.text: Not too small, not too big, but just right for my appetite. My wife has found out that fresh made bread is my kryptonite. I'm happier munching on artisan breads instead of sweets or other junk food. This well-made basket has proven itself to producing fine artisan breads. The recipes that were provided for sourdough via eBook are absolutely delicious. The book is full of insightful methods in pursuing the creation of the perfect sourdough bread. Thank you for a wonderful, durable product that we will use time & time again.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Stepp

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It's the perfect size for making a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's the perfect size for making a loaf of bread in my Romertopf clay baker. The basket is sturdy and will last forever. The instructions for using it the first time were really helpful, and the bread didn't stick, which is great since I usually use really wet dough for sourdough recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Markim

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and shape of these bannetons. As long as I dust with a mix of rye and rice flour I get no sticking. My first use was an 83% hydration loaf of sourdough rye bread. I used the included liner generously dusted with rye and rice flour with a very wet, sticky dough and had absolutely no sticking. This banneton was the perfect size and shape for a 900 gram loaf. I cannot speak to durability as I have only used once. Not sure I would consider this a giftable item since size and shape are determined by a bakers needs.
customer_reviews.author: KeithG

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: If I could it would be 0 stars. Rattan chards and sticks throughout. Dusty with pieces of what looks like dried leaves. Not to mention smell. Measurements are incorrect and smaller than size stated. Product descriptions state you get discounts and s free ebook to Northwest Sourdough. Not sure where I get these as no materials included in how to redeem. Not surprised...sticker says made in China. Off to process refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Cousino

customer_reviews.title: Bread Story is excellent to do business with. Made sure I was satisfied customer!!
customer_reviews.text: The customer service was as good as it can get. Although well made the sz of the oval was smaller than I expected and Shir sent me the 10” round to correct it. I was happy with this. Great communications via email to correct my sz issue. I would definitely recommend this vendor and product.
customer_reviews.author: AgaFan

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for any baker...
customer_reviews.text: I am off on an adventure and it is bread baking. I am a novice and haven't quite figured out all the nuances to the bread making world but I have learned that having a banneton is one of the essentials. This oval banneton will come in handy with my next bake! Looking forward to many crusty, chewy loaves of bread with the quintessential spirals!
customer_reviews.author: BirdWatcher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bread
customer_reviews.text: I have been experimenting with making sourdough bread so I ordered this banneton. Pictured is my first bread using the banneton and my bread came out perfect! The bread is not really sourdough since I used yeast instead of starter- but it is delicious. It is round because I baked it inside a pot using the "Dutch oven" method. I added lactic acid to get the tartness. Today my starter is ready so I will be making real sourdough bread. :) This is a good value and a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt J

customer_reviews.title: Great basket, free ebook is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad’s birthday and he absolutely loves it. The basket is great and pretty standard but the stand-out is the e-book that comes with it. The e-book is great! It’s super detailed and a huge help for sourdough beginners. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: I followed the directions that came with the basket and have had wonderful results (although I haven't used to linen cloth basket ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to using a bread proofing basket (for shaping wet sourdough breads). I followed the directions that came with the basket and have had wonderful results (although I haven't used to linen cloth basket cover). The basket has now become a crucial part of my every-other-day sourdough bread making ritual. The basket is well made and is easy to clean and dry (following the simple directions that came with the basket). I highly recommend the basket :)
customer_reviews.author: M Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy yet lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Nice proofing basket. Sturdily made....very fresh and new...feels nice and firm. I have only used it once and it was fine. And the cloth liner fits it nicely..not to small or to big..but just right. Size is perfect also. Did not give 5 stars because I have only used it once...in time it may prove to be a 5 star...looks promising.
customer_reviews.author: gr8mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful professional looking bread with the bannetton basket
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the basket, and the ring markings on the bread, it’s a nice quality basket, smooth, no splinters. My loaves turned out beautiful. I’m a little disappointed with the linen cover, it’s small for the basket, a struggled for me to stretch the elastic to go over the lip of the basket, I left it out and not bothered. I like the little Instruction booklet, handy and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great size for slicing
customer_reviews.text: I've been making rounds, but this shape makes it easier to have consistent slices. It seemed too small out of the box, but as you can see from the photo it's a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great build and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is my first five star review. This exactly what i wanted,great build and perfect size. My first bread came out perfect. I am now a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne John

customer_reviews.title: Best with the linen liner
customer_reviews.text: This basket was more expensive than the others, but it was the size I wanted. The sourdough dough stuck to the cane, even though I loaded it with flour. I tried twice, and it was a disaster each time. Then I decided to use the linen liner (heavily floured) and that was a big improvement. The dough releases very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Aryn Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Full-sized banneton for sourdough baking
customer_reviews.text: The largest oval Banneton that I could find on Amazon. Perfect for recipes of up to 1kg of ingredients/water. Used to make 30% wholewheat sourdough, and the bread came out looking great.
customer_reviews.author: John Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Very happy bread baker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use with the oval clay baker I purchased. It works perfectly and made transferring the ‘log’ loaf to the baker easy. Bread rose perfectly. I just started using a benneton basket and wish I had discovered them years ago. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B.

customer_reviews.title: Great basket for long bread!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make longer loaves of rye and it did not disappoint. It is easy to prep and use and will help the dough keep its shape. Use the cover if you do not want the lines on your bread, but I am very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Muniz

customer_reviews.title: Highly recomment
customer_reviews.text: LOVING THE OVAL PROOFING BASKET SET. THIS IS A GREAT INVESTMENT TO OUR KITCHEN BAKE WARE. I WOULD DEFINITELY PURCHASE FROM THIS SELLER AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good basket
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sturdy; and a good e-book came with it. I already have a round proofing basket from a different company, and this company offered an oval basket in the size I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth F.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money....looking forward to making future purchases of other basket sets.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Looking forward to making future purchases on more so that I can bake more loaves of bread. The basket is of high quality. The instructions are spot on. As noted, I will be purchasing additional baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I've proofed sourdough in the past without a basket. Dough comes out easily, makes a nice design and works well. Seems sturdy so far.
customer_reviews.author: PerryOhio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice little proofing basket. Perfect for sandwich bread shaped loaves.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my loaf pan. Basket and cloth are of very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael GrantTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: The proofing basket is very sturdy and should last a very long time
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this proofing basket, it makes a great loaf of bread. Very sturdy easy to use also
customer_reviews.author: R.G.W

customer_reviews.title: Good size, well made.
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than I had expected... smaller than ideal for large Italian loaves but perfect for artisans. The loaf is more efficient to cut and easier to store than rounds using this shape. Perfect for 3-cup flour no-knead recipe.
customer_reviews.author: MikeInWeston

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with Bread Story purchase..
customer_reviews.text: The basket came just as pictured and advertised.... good quality.. cannot wait to use.. have all ready signed up on their e-mail list.
customer_reviews.author: T. Talmage

customer_reviews.title: Great proofing basket
customer_reviews.text: Have several sizes of these proofing baskets and love them. Making bread has become a recent hobby and have found these baskets to be beneficial in proofing and adding texture to the top of the bread.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B

customer_reviews.title: Banneton and other helpful links.
customer_reviews.text: Used it the next day after receiving it and very pleased with the outcome of the bread. Amazing how lightweight it is. It came with a sourdough book to be downloaded and few other helpful links.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a complete kit with a helpful breadmaking ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a complete kit with a helpful breadmaking guide. Basket is very tight and sturdy, as is the covering cloth. Will be doing business again with Bread Story soon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas H Newman

customer_reviews.title: Gives variety.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this basket because it gives a variety to the shapes of loaves I make.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Well made, light weight. Works as expected. Just be sure to air-dry and store it dry so it doesn’t get moldy. I love mine!
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: WELL MADE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Even though I have not had an opportunity to use this product, it appears to be quite substantial in design and fabrication. I'm sure it will meet my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Mozart

customer_reviews.title: The proofing oval baskets look like they are made of good quality material
customer_reviews.text: The proofing oval baskets look like they are made of good quality material. I have not used them yet. I will be soon. The only reason no five stars is the free ebook and other downloads from the manufacturer I could never download.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended Is much smaller than I expected. ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended Is much smaller than I expected. I had ordered the round basket prior and that is way bigger. This is my fault for assuming the basket would be of similar size. This basket is for smaller size loafs.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Cue

customer_reviews.title: Can't imagine a better proofing basket!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first proofing basket, but I can't imagine any better quality. It's great! Just as advertised. This seller was great to work with, too! Just right to proof bread for use in a loaf pan or a German Dutch oven.
customer_reviews.author: Lorbear

customer_reviews.title: makes beautiful loaves
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Easier to use than I thought it would be. I think I need a couple more!
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Very nice banneton, looks just like its picture.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, looks like the picture, basket and liner made well
customer_reviews.author: sherri

customer_reviews.title: Great Banneton and liner!
customer_reviews.text: I love this new banner on. It is well built and the liner is heavy duty. I have had many others, but this one is truly a well built and stitched craft!
customer_reviews.author: G Herrington

customer_reviews.title: Valuable bread making addition
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and made. It simplified the shaping of a bread loaf. A practical addition for making bread.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Cannavo

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great bread basket. As described, super fast shipping. Will buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality basket and linen liner. Comes with short instructional pamphlet about proper use and care. A++
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D'Auge

customer_reviews.title: Crazy good
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these bowls. If you are baking artisan bread you really need these.

customer_reviews.title: Size info is not correct
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as being 10" x 6"; however, the outside measurements are well under that and the interior is obviously even less; this will only make a very small loaf of bread.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J.

customer_reviews.title: super easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Love this product - super easy to use and clean. And the service has been absolutely great with emails with lots of helpful information about sourdough bread baking and even a free book about sourdough bread making.
customer_reviews.author: Henriette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I had never used a proofing basket before, this is a very nice one.
customer_reviews.author: DEG OK

customer_reviews.title: Bake your own!
customer_reviews.text: Our local bread baker (my wife!) says it worked perfectly. It's a little smaller than another one we have but the bread turned the same size from both baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Guarriello

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This banneton is a baby size. Description says 10x6, which it is but from outside edge to outside edge. I was so disappointed by the size.
customer_reviews.author: Lindaa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to make perfectly shaped oval bread! Very easy to use and clean. The instructions were very user friendly- highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Great Banneton
customer_reviews.text: A great Banneton with cover and instructions, I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Swamper

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for great business!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased to have the Proofing Basket set by Bread Story. I use it every day and it is a great item for making bread. Item was delivered promptly and is exactly how it was described.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Kiryanova

customer_reviews.title: I think the price is a bit high for what you get but i shopped around and came back to that post
customer_reviews.text: dusted the cloth a lot but my dough still stuck lost to loaves i us them with no cloth

customer_reviews.title: These baskets made my bread making experience very easy. These are my second loaves
customer_reviews.text: These baskets made my bread making experience very easy. These are my second loaves. Now I need more because everyone wants bread.

customer_reviews.title: SO HAPPY with this product
customer_reviews.text: SO HAPPY with this product. It's top quality material and it's very easy to clean. Also love that's it's the perfect size for storage. Would totally recommend it to others.

customer_reviews.title: ... when it comes to baking has made it very easy for proofing my sourdough

customer_reviews.title: Bread comes out great everytime!

customer_reviews.text: This works great! It arrived faster than I thought it would. I'll buy from this company again... thank you!

customer_reviews.text: I like the size. needs to be floured heavily to avoid sticking, but that is part of the learning curve! Otherwise works great.

customer_reviews.title: I got this as a gift for my daughter in ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my daughter in law. I gave it 4 stars for it's quality.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy poor quality does not work as described
customer_reviews.text: No response from seller to follow-up questions. Do not buy poor quality does not work as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great service and information, good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, nice quality product and good online information on how to use and care for the product. I love that it has the linen liner, but also provides information on using without the liner to get the wonderful ridges for an attractive crust. Thank you from an eager still-learning breadmaker!
customer_reviews.author: Antonine K

customer_reviews.title: The basket is fine..
customer_reviews.text: The basket is fine... the liner on the other hand frayed enough when I washed it (washed it once before using). Needed to get out my sewing machine and mend it before it could even be used. Fine now, but it shouldn't have been necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Sue D

customer_reviews.title: Buy With Confidence
customer_reviews.text: These arrived as promised and I couldn't be happier with my new bread baskets. The linen lining fits perfectly, the baskets are top quality and my bread came out amazing. As a recent convert to sourdough baking, I truly appreciate how these have taken me to the next level. My family is getting a little impatient with all the obsessing, but they LOVE the bread and l love the fact that I can now turn out beautiful loaves. These are great.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppa mama

customer_reviews.title: Essential tool for bread making
customer_reviews.text: I received my banneton just recently and can't wait to use it. It arrived quickly even though we're in the busiest time of the Christmas season. My sourdough starter is just about ready and I'm sure I will love the results. I've never used a banneton for prior bread making but I'm sure it will solve the problem of my loafs spreading too much during baking. Should be the right size loaf for two people who eat like four.
customer_reviews.author: christine l. arendas

customer_reviews.title: No need to use this to let your bread  rise.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know "proofing" means same as "let it rise". This is totally useless to me as far as baking goes, so I use it to hold lemons on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Makes your bread look professional
customer_reviews.text: This basket make a professional looking loaf of bread! I love this proofing basket because it puts nice decorative rings around the loaf prior to baking.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Dough in a basket
customer_reviews.text: Build on this basket is well done, dough doesn’t stick like I have had with other buys and the length is what I needed for my bakery.
customer_reviews.author: chef colorado

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected this proofing basket to be
customer_reviews.text: This basket fully met my expectations. I used 500gr of dough, and the resulting bâtard (can I say bâtard? I can say bâtard, right?) was perfect. It even comes with very concise instructions, which even helped me use my other round basket properly (lightly moisten, coat with flour, shake out excess). I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Canas

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Have used it once. Dough turned out into the baker easily. Hope all subsequent uses are as successful. Be sure to follow initial directions
customer_reviews.author: TCV

customer_reviews.title: This basket is great, did what my cookbook stated it would
customer_reviews.text: This basket is great, did what my cookbook stated it would. Good construction. Company seems committed to customer satisfaction as evidenced by unsolicited e-mails and bonus material. Didn't have to contact them though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Using Proofing baskes for the best Sourdough bread.
customer_reviews.text: My wife is very pleased with the manner in which the sourdough bred turned out using this oval Proofing basket. Thanks for the quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: John Miesel

customer_reviews.title: Happy to have a rectangular banneton
customer_reviews.text: Happy to have a rectangular banneton, with a nice liner. The liner is more sturdy than others. I bought the basket to proof loaves in my rectangular stone baker. The basket is a little shorter and wider, but useful. The shape also makes a nice serving basket for breads etc.
customer_reviews.author: SG-SAN FRANCISCO

customer_reviews.title: Problematic
customer_reviews.text: Have several of these proofing baskets from various vendors. This is the only one we have problems with. Simply put no matter what we try the dough sticks. Can't recommend.

customer_reviews.title: You'll LOVE this Proofing Basket!
customer_reviews.text: This is the PERFECT size and quality basket to proof my breads in! It's sturdy, functional and light at the same time...thank you BREAD STORY and AMAZON!

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid
customer_reviews.text: I needed a proofing basket and this fits my needs. It is very well made and should last through hundreds of loaves. So probably about a year maybe more.

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality banneton and liner. No splitting or fraying of cane. It’s a perfect little banneton for our house loaf.

customer_reviews.title: Great basket for bread baking
customer_reviews.text: Great for sour dough. Makes a wonderful crust and so easy to use. Highly recommend. Just what you want for bread loaves.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great seller and great basket. They make wonderful products for baking. very happy

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this long proofing basket and their round loaf basket, they are quality products.

customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Have used it with sourdough. Did a great job.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: No matter how I prepare my dough or the bowl, everything sticks to it!

product_meta.title: (10x6 inch) Oval Proofing Basket Set by Bread Story – Banneton/Brotform Handmade Unbleached Natural Cane Bread Baking Kit with Cloth Liner - Course Discount, Coupon
feature_bullets: ✔ BEST BREAD BAKING KIT AVAILABLE - Perfect for bread baking lovers, BREAD STORY’S OVAL PROOFING BASKET SET is for professional and amateur bakers – Works for Proofing, Banneton, or Brotform baking techniques – The bread set includes a large oval bowl with a removable cloth liner, ebook on baking sourdough bread, baking class discount, instructions, and future coupon to use - Dimensions are ten inches long, six inches wide, and almost four inches tall;

✔ TOP QUALITY MATERIALS USED - Made of handmade, hand-crafted unbleached natural rattan cane that is eco-friendly, food-safe, and non-toxic, the BREAD STORY’S OVAL BANNETON BASKET SET can hold up to three pounds of dough, the ideal choice for large families;

✔ EASY TO USE AND EASY TO CLEAN – The BREAD STORY’S OVAL BROTFORM BASKET SET is ideal for making all types of bread that need time to rise or expand – With its durable off-white cloth liner that has an elastic edging that stretches for removing, it can be machine or hand washed – Professional use and cleaning with tips are included;

✔ FREE BONUS GIFTS – Not only do you get the Basket and Cloth Liner included in the BREAD STORY’S OVAL PROOFING BASKET SET, but also included in a polybag are a Flyer with a QR code for a FREE Present, “Professional Sourdough Baked at Home” Ebook by Teresa L Greenway, and a Discount Coupon for the baking course, “Northwest Sourdough,” by the author;

✔ ORDER WITH ONE HUNDRED PERCENT SATISFACTION OR YOUR MONEY BACK - With our no-questions-asked, hassle-free satisfaction guarantee, you are covered - If you aren't completely satisfied with the BREAD STORY’S OVAL BANNETON BASKET SET, contact us immediately to resolve the issue - PLACE YOUR ORDER WITH CONFIDENCE today and get the oval basket, liner, ebook, and discounts.
